director.name: 玛塔·米诺罗华兹 Marta Minorowicz

introduction: A deeply religious Ukrainian woman, Swietlana, who has been living in Polandfor several years, wants to bring her daughter and grandchildren to Poland toensure a better future for them. Her prayers seem to be answered. After thedeath of the Polish family she worked for, she inherits an apartment in Warsaw and it seems that nothing prevents her from finally starting a new life. Butwould what she wanted so badly bring her happiness? Can sacrifice and lovechange destiny?
